item.description:
Hi, folks,

Are you interested in EVPs (electronic voice phenomena)? This meetup is for you. We have an EVP expert who generously offered to give a lecture on EVPs and to share some of his EVPs with us.
His name is Haydon Hall and he run sa team out in Connecticut
called NEAPRI. During the dark cold months of winter when few
investigations are pursued because of raging furnaces making
audio close to an impossibility, he frequently lectures using a
DLP and a PowerPoint presentation on EVP and other audio anomalies.

His lecture lasts 90 minutes and covers the following:

History
Equipment Used (Analog & Digital)
Capturing Methods
Enhancements Disk
Recording Methods & Procedures
Classifications & Examples

He was trained by Todd Bates of Haunted Voices as an EVP
Specialist using Adobe Audition software in amplification,
filtering, restoration and analysis. I've also asked him to demo
Audacity, a free audio editing program.

Following his lecture, we'll have pizza. Please feel free to bring EVPs
that you've captured so that we can share our evidence. I don't know about you,
but I love listening to EVPs. :')

Sorry, but I have to put a 20-person limit on this meetup because that's the limit for
the room we have available for the event.

WHEN: 5pm - 8pm, Sunday, February 27th

COST: $5.00 for pizza and soft drinks

WHERE: Worcester State College( now Worcester State University)



DIRECTIONS:
Worcester State College (University)
486 Chandler St.
Worcester MA. 01602

from the north:

Rt. 2 East To 190 south

190 sonth to 290 east

290 east to exit 13 Kelly sq. ( 290 west to exit 13
Kelly sq. Turn left )

Turn right go though kelly sq. to Madison St. (in btween the
Hess station and the Gulf)

Stay staight on Madison St . It turns into Chandler St. 2.5
miles on the left side you will be at the College.

Take the south entrance and go straight through the blinking red
light. Go up the hill to the dorms.

At the top of the hill the building in front of you is called
Waslyean Hall (Weslyean?). Go in the front door and
down the hall to Sevenhill lounge.
See you there!


From 122 south:

Go through Paxton center by the Worcester airpor.t After the airport, go through the first set of lights
and turn right ongo Chandler St. Follow that straight to the
college on your right. Use the south enterance ( follow
above directions)
item.name: EVP lecture and pizza party
